ai-patthana16.76:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.76:0.3_0: for those looking forwards, etc., which are attached to, and so on,
ai-patthana16.76:1.1_0: One who has not grasped the teaching, and doesn’t give rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana16.76:1.1_1: One who doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping. ...
ai-patthana16.76:1.1_2: Such things don’t arise because of not grasping.
ai-patthana16.76:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.76:2.1_0: When there is a reason for this, on the result of deeds, and the result of deeds, non-confusion is abandoned when the paths are not clear.
ai-patthana16.76:3.1_0: for the sake of the resentment, not for the sake of grasping, nor for the resentment, etc., is a condition for the lifting of the teaching.
ai-patthana16.76:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.76:4.1_0: There is a new uninterrupted objects, three dreams, and produced in the darkness. There is no newly arrived monks in the ninth threshold for nine.
